ygData.subject: ROOT
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I was standing next to an NPC  and it happened to a friend of mine too, so if you want to cast ROOT on yourslef, make sure no NPCs are around to see it.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I was standing next to an NPC and it happened to a friend of mine too,
so if you want to cast ROOT on yourslef, make sure no NPCs are around to see
it.

----- Original Message -----
From: Joe Wallace <joew88@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 1:13 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Murderous Merchant In Akanon.


> From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
> That's strange. I cast root on myself all the time while fishing, and
have
> never gotten killed.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 8:18 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Murderous Merchant In Akanon.
>
>
> > From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
> >
> > FYI . . .
> > I cast ROOT on MYSELF and got killed for it in Felwithe, so NO ROOT at
> all
> > in town!!!!
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Spehar, David J <David.Spehar@...>
> > To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 10:48 AM
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Murderous Merchant In Akanon.
> >
> >
> > > From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
> > >
> > > I had the same effect. It doesnt attack me and I worship Tunare.
Just
> > > doesnt sell to me. Did this person CAST any spells around the NPC?
If
> > you
> > > practice ROOT on another person (NPC or PC) they will attack you. I
> have
> > > learned this lesson the hard way...via death.
> > >
> > > - Ziffnab
> >
